3. **Trust badges**: Would need actual certifications or association memberships to display.

### Recommended Process Changes
1. **High Priority**: When issues involve external assets (logos, images, content requiring permission), clearly separate "can do now" items from "requires external dependency" items - From Scout-and-Plan
2. **Medium Priority**: Consider text-based alternatives as first approach for partner/logo displays to avoid licensing complexity - From Build Agent
